data.title: Michael P. Bauer - CEO at Libbey
data.meta_description: Michael P. Bauer is currently the CEO at Libbey. Prior to this, they were the President at the Master Lock Company from December 2014 to July 2018.
data.text:
Michael P. Bauer is currently the CEO at Libbey. Prior to this, they were the President at the Master Lock Company from December 2014 to July 2018. Before that, Bauer was the President of Moen Incorporated from November 1997 to November 2014. In October 2018, Bauer became a Board Member at Edsal Manufacturing and held that position until April 2020. From January 1997 to November 1997, Bauer was the CFO at Nook Industries. Michael began their career at Avery Dennison in November 1992 as a Plant Controller and held various other positions before leaving in January 1997. Bauer started their professional career at Coopers & Lybrand in July 1987 as an Audit Manager.

Michael P. Bauer earned their MBA in finance from the Weatherhead School of Management at Case Western Reserve University and their BBA in accounting from Cleveland State University.

Sarah Zibbel - Senior Vice President, Chief Human Resources Officer, Jim Burmeister - Senior Vice President, Chief Operating Officer, and William Mossing - Senior Vice President, Chief Supply Chain Officer report to Michael P. Bauer.
